items.name: FARRENBERG
items.remarks: PPR for SEP, almost impossible to achieve with Regierungspräsidium Authority

instrumentApproachAids.remarks:
Location of the LOC is 91 m west of THR 09 and 20 m north of the RCL;
LOC course (offset 0.4°) crosses the RCL 0.8 NM in front of the THR 27.

items.name: GELNHAUSEN
items.remarks:
Strength: 2000 kg MPW / PPR: 3500 kg MPW / HEL: 6000 kg MPW
Isolated tree south of runway

items.name: GAMMELSDORF
items.remarks: Landing direction for TMG is RWY18 only!

runways.remarks: only ILS or GLS APCH allowed

frequencies.name: 3X PTT FOR LIGHTING AND VIDEO SURVEILLANCE

items.name: HAGUENAU
items.remarks:
AD reserved for radio equipped ACFT.
Unpaved RWY unusable during gliders activity.

images.description: Traffic pattern and noise abatement zones

items.name: MAINZ/FINTHEN
items.contact:
Flugplatz Mainz
Am Flugplatz 36
55126 Mainz
https://edfz.de/

images.description: During approach to Runway 31 - threshold is at the hangar.

hoursOfOperation.remarks: Saturday from 13:00 local time, Sunday and Holidays from 10:00 local time. During flying season and nice weather only - airfield is operated by flying club, without fixed operating hours. Other days/times on request.

items.remarks: For ACFT above 14t MTOM PPR until preceding working day 1200(1100)

runways.remarks: For departure taxi to the end of the airport.
For departure taxi to the end of the airport. Do Not try to depart from THR ;)

frequencies.name: RAMSTEIN GROUND CONTROL
frequencies.remarks: VFR trafic near the Ramstein CTR should contact ground control during week with callsign and Intention. On weekend tower frequency is used.

items.name: ANTERSBERG
items.contact:
Antersberg 50 (Flugplatz)
83104 Tuntenhausen
E-Mail: fc-condor@web.de
Landline: +49 8065 1261
Mobile: +49 176 51274731
Web: www.fc-condor-antersberg.de
items.remarks:
Intense glider activities within a radius of 10km and up to 1500m MSL mostly at weekends and during public holidays.
During operations are both, winch and aerotow for gliders of up to 850kg, available.

items.name: SARREGUEMINES NEUNKIRCH
items.remarks:
Reserved for radio-equipped ACFT.
Very noise-sensitive platform.
Avoid as far as possible overflight of inhabited areas and crossing of Franco-German boundary.

AD with heavy glider activity :
- inform on A/A FREQ when passing overhead,
- avoid transit in gliders' circuit North-West position.

Tel: +496893830

items.name: SARRE UNION
items.remarks:
AD reserved for home-based ACFT and ACFT based on neighbouring AD.
AD available for HEL.
Simultaneous use of both RWY prohibited.
Unpaved RWY 08L/26R unusable after heavy rainfalls.

items.name: HIRZENHAIN-NORDWESTHANG

runways.remarks: Only usable by gliders doing winch/bungee starts.

items.remarks: Glider site seldomly used for bungee/winch starts. Not an official airfield! RC models also use this site!
